titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the individuals responsible for the murder of four United States Marines in El Salvador be held accountable for their actions.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 12/2/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of State exercise all available diplomatic means to ensure that those responsible for the massacre of the four United States Marines in El Salvador be held accountable for their actions and not be absolved from punishment under an amnesty law.
